content:
You're welcome! I'm excited to hear that you're starting to set up your display case and create a diorama for your Attack on Titan figurines. It's going to be an amazing way to showcase your collection and bring the world of Attack on Titan to life.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and be creative with your display case and diorama. Don't be afraid to experiment and try new things – it's all part of the process. If you need any more advice or inspiration, feel free to reach out to me anytime.

Good luck, and I hope you'll share pictures of your finished display case and diorama with me! I'd love to see how it turns out.

Happy collecting and creating!
